item.title: Conan O'Brien's Oscars 2026 Return Continues A Host Streak That I Don't Think Will End Anytime Soon
item.description: Conan O'Brien will host the 2026 Oscars after his successful performance at the 2025 ceremony, and his return continues an exciting hosting streak.

item.title: Shadow Force Trailer
item.description: Kerry Washington and Omar Sy are starring together as former spies turned couple, who get caught up in trouble in the first trailer for Shadow Force.

item.title: Every Todd Haynes Movie, Ranked Worst To Best
item.description: Todd Haynes has had a prosperous career as a writer-director with gripping films like May December, Carol, and more.
